snippet: The sexual dimension in an equal marriage often gets lost because even though people are running these well-oiled, cooperative machines at home, they can forget to create a space for this other side of their partners.
abstract: The sexual dimension in an equal marriage often gets lost because even though people are running these well-oiled, cooperative machines at home, they can forget to create a space for this other side of their partners.

headline.main: Behind the Cover Story: Lori Gottlieb on the Sex Lives in Peer Marriages
